content:
I have a little stack of PRs leading up to bimonoid objects. The first three are independent.

  • #10098 feat: comonoid objects in a braided category form a monoidal category
  • #10103 feat: no interesting comonoid objects in cartesian monoidal categories
  • #12856 feat: oplax monoidal functors
  • #12858 feat: oplax monoidal functors take comonoids to comonoids (depends on #10098 and #12856)
  • #12970 feat: definition of bimonoid object in a braided category (depends on #12858)

From here it's a short step to defining Hopf monoids (which in a cartesian monoidal category reduce to group objects).
